•	Coordinates recruitment efforts for all Northcentral positions.•	Works with hiring managers to successfully implement staffing plans.•	Assists with calculation of staffing metrics.•	Researches and recommends new sources for active and passive candidate recruiting. •	Develops a pool of qualified candidates through various sourcing techniques.•	Researches innovative ways of using the Internet for recruitment.•	Attends career job fairs for meeting recruitment needs and enhancing University recognition.•	Coordinates the interview process, including pre-screening of resumes, sending application packets, arranging interviews, and facilitating skills testing, as needed.•	Performs reference and background checks for potential employees.•	Facilitates the on-boarding process.•	Maintains database or spreadsheets of recruitment activities.•	Maintains relationships with temporary agencies to fill temporary employment needs.•	Assists with creation of job descriptions. •	Conducts regular follow-up with managers to determine the effectiveness of recruiting plans and implementation.

The Creative Group specializes in connecting talented, creative professionals with companies looking to hire interactive, design, marketing, advertising and public relations talent.•	Managed full-cycle recruiting process from initial pre-screening process through candidate placement and follow-up, for a range of job functions from entry-level positions to senior management roles. •	Consistently ranked among top performers among nationwide employees. •	Determined requirements, crafted job descriptions, and posted open and on-going opportunities on various job sites and social media. •	Identified key traits of job openings and matched opportunities with ideal candidates based on job duties, company location, compensation, and other environmental factors. •	Coordinated and presented bi-weekly training on recruiting best practices to recruiting team.
